meta.title: Delivering the News
meta.editorNote: Welcome to our Reinvention issue. This month, we explore how GenAI is reshaping the supply chain and hear from our leadership on the Q4 roadmap.

news.headline: Holiday shopping 2025: Smarter spending & renewed confidence
news.summary: Consumer confidence is up 12% as AI-driven personalization hits mainstream retail.
news.excerpt: Our latest research indicates a shift from cautious spending to value-driven investment. Retailers leveraging predictive AI for inventory are seeing a 15% margin increase.
news.author: Sarah Jenkins, Retail Strategy
news.fullContent:
The 2025 holiday season is projected to be a landmark year for AI integration. Retailers who have adopted 'Just-in-Time' personalization are seeing basket sizes increase significantly.

Key takeaways include:

  • Hyper-personalization at scale
  • Automated supply chain resilience
  • Green logistics as a preference driver

news.headline: Destination Net Zero 2025
news.summary: How our Consumer Goods practice is leading the charge on sustainable packaging.
news.excerpt: We've partnered with 3 global FMCG giants to overhaul their plastic usage. The results are promising, with a projected 40% reduction in virgin plastic use by Q3.
news.author: Marcus Thorne, Sustainability Lead

news.headline: Growth in the age of GenAI
news.summary: Navigating the new creative frontier in marketing.
news.excerpt: Generative AI isn't just for code. It's revolutionizing how we concept campaigns. See how our internal teams are using Firefly and Midjourney to speed up ideation.
news.author: Elena Rodriguez, Interactive

leadership.name: David Chen
leadership.title: Global Managing Director
leadership.content: As we head into Q4, our focus remains on 'Total Enterprise Reinvention'. The feedback from the Client Advisory Board has been stellar. Let's keep the momentum high and focus on delivery excellence.

leadership.name: Amara Diallo
leadership.title: North America Lead
leadership.content: Great work on the Project Horizon launch. The client is thrilled with the initial rollout. Remember to submit your vacation plans for the holidays by next Friday so we can resource adequately.

popQuiz.question: What percentage of consumers now prioritize 'sustainable packaging' over brand loyalty?
popQuiz.explanation: Correct! Recent studies show 55% of consumers will switch brands for more sustainable packaging options.

popQuiz.question: Which technology is projected to drive the highest margin increase in Q4?
popQuiz.explanation: Predictive AI for inventory management is seeing a 15% margin increase.

resources.description: Full analysis of spending trends across NA and EMEA.

resources.description: 10-minute crash course on effective prompting for market research.
